pageContext.claim: “Well, they've had floods for many years in Texas, and they've had hurricanes for many years in Texas. And I think one of the big differences is we really have it down to a science now. In the last three and a half years, we've done something that nobody has done. Nobody has reacted to hurricanes and flooding like the Trump administration.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration's reaction to Hurricane Maria that devastated Puerto Rico has been widely criticized.
